ComicInfo.Title: Anthony; Collars & Cuffs; Don & Kat; Demon Hunter Ernest
ComicInfo.Summary:
Demon Hunter Ernest: A demon challenges a novice demon hunter to a contest.
Dream On: Kat's exuberance in bed puts too much pressure on Don to perform.
Valor: Nikki subdues a wanted felon while on a lunch break at a convenience store. Her sudden fame causes her to embellish the incident for the press until things begin to get out of hand.
Get A Job: ANThony has little luck finding employment.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev110 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-28 18:27:55. [Issue ID 226552]
